title: prime factorization function
extract: A factor tree is a diagram that is used to break down a number into its factors until all the numbers left are prime. The first way you can use a factor tree to find the factorization of a number is to divide out prime numbers only. ... Since 24 is an even number, the first prime number that can be factored out is a 2.Dec 15, 2013
